Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:port element in IP-Xact specification.

Port describes a single external port on the component

Definition at line 26 of file port.h.

Write the contents of the class using the writer.

void Port::setName ( const QString &  name  ) 

Set the name for the port.

Note: This function should not be called directly to change the name of the port because model has stored the ports in a map indexed by name. Instead use the model's renamePort() function.

Parameters:
name QString containing the name

Definition at line 286 of file port.cpp.

References General::NameGroup::name_, and nameGroup_.

void Port::setTransactional ( Transactional *  transactional  ) 

Set the transactional element for the port.

Calling this function will delete the old wire and transactional elements, if found. This also changes the port type into TRANSACTIONAL.

transactional A pointer to the new transactional instance.

Definition at line 266 of file port.cpp.

Set the wire element for the port.

Calling this function will delete the old wire and transactional elements, if found. This also changes the port type into WIRE.

wire A pointer to the new wire instance.

QString Port::getDefaultValue (  )  const

Get the default value of the port.

This function can be used to get the default value of the port defined spirit:driver withing spirit:wire. If the default value is not defined a null QString is returned.

Returns:
QString containing the default value.

Definition at line 378 of file port.cpp.

References wire_.

General::Direction Port::getDirection (  )  const

Get the direction of the port.

This function can be used to get the direction of a wired port. If the port is not wired type DIRECTION_INVALID is returned.

Returns:
Enum direction defining the direction.

bool Port::hasType ( const QString &  viewName = QString()  )  const

Check if the port has a type name in given view.

If view is not defined then all possibilities are checked and if no type is specified for any view false is returned.

Parameters:
viewName The name of the view that's type name is searched for.
Returns:
bool False if type is not defined.

Definition at line 504 of file port.cpp.

References portType_, General::WIRE, and wire_.

void Port::useDefaultVhdlTypes (  ) 

Use Default vhdl types and type definitions for the port.

Default types are: std_logic for ports sized 1 std_logic_vector for ports larger than one bit.

The default type definition is IEEE.std_logic_1164.all

Definition at line 552 of file port.cpp.
